article:
One day a teacher asked her students to think of the nicest thing they could say about each of their   _   and write it down.
That Saturday, the teacher  _   down the name of each student on a separate piece of paper, and   _   what everyone else had said about that individual. On Monday she gave each student his or her list. Before long, the   _   class were smiling. She heard whispers. "I never knew that I meant anything to anyone!" and "I didn't know others  _   me so much." were most of the   _  .
No one ever mentioned those papers in class again. But it didn't matter. The   _   had achieved its   _  . The students were   _   with themselves and one another.
Several years later, one of the students Mark was killed in Vietnam and his teacher   _   the funeral   of that special student. Ks5u
After the funeral, Mark's father said to his teacher, "I want to show you something." Then he took a wallet out of his   _  . "They found this on Mark when he was killed. I thought you might   _   it." The teacher knew without looking that the papers were the ones on which she had listed all the   _   things each of Mark's classmates had said about him. "Thank you so much for doing that," Mark's father said. "As you can see, Mark   _   it."
In fact, we don't know when life will end one day. So please, tell the people you love and care for, that they are   _   and important. Tell them, before it is too late...
